title: Birthday Wishes to BJ and Adriano!
content: Muchas felicidades a los dos! Seguro que os mereceis regalos...
author: Ignacio

comments.content:
Happy Birthday Adriano!   
   
thanks for the birthday wishes. ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050902155320im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)
